sentences.cn: 碟形卫星天线的定向性非常强。

sentences.en: I'll dish up and you can grate the Parmesan.
sentences.cn: 我来上菜，你把帕尔马干酪磨碎。

sentences.en: In a large microwave-proof dish, melt butter for 20 seconds.
sentences.cn: 让黄油在微波适用的大盘子里熔化20秒钟。

sentences.en: One of the waitresses arrived with a very odd-looking dish.
sentences.cn: 一位女招待端来一道样子相当古怪的菜。

sentences.en: Place all the chopped vegetables into a casserole dish.
sentences.cn: 把所有切好的蔬菜放入砂锅。

sentences.en: Prepare the souffle dish before making up the souffle mixture.
sentences.cn: 在搅拌做蛋奶酥的各种原料之前先要把盘子准备好。

sentences.en: Put the eggplants side by side in a serving dish.
sentences.cn: 将茄子码齐放在上菜用的盘子里。

sentences.en: Serve straight from the dish with a tossed green salad.
sentences.cn: 配上拌过了的田园色拉直接上桌。

sentences.cn: 编码信号由碟形卫星天线接收。

sentences.en: The council wants to dish the money out to specific projects.
sentences.cn: 理事会想把钱分配到具体的工程。

sentences.en: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.cn: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

sentences.en: This dish may be prepared a day ahead of time and refrigerated.
sentences.cn: 这道菜可以提前一天准备好并冷藏起来。

sentences.en: This is a vegetarian dish that carnivores love.
sentences.cn: 这是一道肉食主义者爱吃的素菜。

sentences.en: This simple chicken dish costs less than £1 a head.
sentences.cn: 这道简单的鸡肉菜肴每人的花费还不到1英镑。

sentences.en: Try this tasty dish for supper with a crispy salad.
sentences.cn: 晚饭就着鲜脆的色拉尝尝这道佳肴。

trans.tran_cn: 盘,碟，（待洗的）餐具，一道菜，盘状物

trans.tran_cn: 将…盛于盘中，分发，使成轮盘状
trans.tran_en: to give a lot of information about something or someone, especially something that would usually be secret or private
